title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - Dec 20 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - Dec 20 2021
description:
Buck hosts solo, Clay on vacation, embraced by the warm freedom of Florida. Montage of Democrats promising vaccinations would stop the spread. Vaxxed and boostered libs, Elizabeth Warren, Cory Booker and Jim Cramer, all sick with covid. Fauci calls for masks on planes forever. Dr. Marty Makary, author of the Price We Pay: What Broke American Health Care -- and How to Fix It, joins Buck to explain the difference between Delta and Omicron, and what the public health officials and Biden administration are doing wrong. Fauci's legacy. Clueless MSNBC host wonders why so many vaccinated people are getting infected. Libs freak out over Sen. Joe Manchin killing Biden's Build Back Better bill. Buck calls him the "grinch who stole the commie's Christmas."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
